description: Dive into "Sharjah's Shopping Oasis: Malls to Explore" — a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Sharjah's Shopping Oasis: Malls to Explore

places.generalDescription: Dubai Festival City Mall is a sprawling shopping hub in the UAE, offering a versatile experience for visitors. With over 400 stores, it features luxury brands and mid-range options, with discounts of up to 50-70% during sales. The mall hosts elaborate shopping festivals and the renowned IMAGINE show, which includes water, light & laser displays. Visitors can enjoy various dining options, a cinema complex, and entertainment for the whole family.

sources.snippet: This mall blends retail and entertainment with a gorgeous waterfront location. The nightly IMAGINE performance, which features fire, light, and water displays, is a highlight. Plan a trip to see this amazing performance when your city tour.
sources.shortName: The Top 10 Biggest Shopping Malls in Dubai

places.name: Dubai Festival City Mall

reviews.text: Really great mall with a good fountain show. Easy to access via Taxis & close to the airport if you only have a short time in Dubai. Lots of shopping options and home of the Hard Rock Cafe in Dubai. Would definitely return and recommend visiting this mall.

I recently visited this mall and had a wonderful experience. The overall aesthetics are modern and well-maintained, creating a pleasant and relaxing atmosphere. One of the highlights was the spacious and well-equipped child play area-perfect for families. The layout is easy to navigate, with a great mix of shopping, dining, and entertainment options. Definitely a great place to spend time with family or friends. Highly recommended!

Wow this is another busy mall reminded me of the dubai mall but this is  a lot smaller in size but has too many shop outlets under one roof all i need from clothes to food to entertainers  spred over four level from top to bottom so if you want to get your steps in belive me youll me doing more than 10k .kept me and my family busy avearage time spent here wa roughly upto 2 to 3 hours .and when women go shopping  am always left outer pocket all the time ..the views outside was amazing has a little watter front to walk around with my misses while the kids were busy Inside the mall.tbe land of legendrium was totally amazing costly around  130 and per person (£35) reminded me of a fantasy world of Adam and even and all the evil creature one kind fantasise about. Looked very realistic .believe during sunset take a stroll along the path way surrounding  the waterfront you will love it especially when it is lit up at night

places.generalDescription: City Centre Mirdif is a sprawling, modern shopping haven that caters to every taste and budget. With over 430 stores, including popular names like Zara and Hamleys, this mall is a go-to destination for shoppers across Dubai. Beyond retail therapy, it boasts an impressive array of entertainment options such as indoor skydiving at iFly and the thrilling Sky Trail. Families will love the seasonal Winter Wonderland experience that transforms the mall into a snowy retreat filled with festive activities.

sources.snippet: Explore Mirdif City Centre and get away from the busy metropolis. This mall offers family-friendly activities, making it the ideal place for a leisurely shopping experience. If you’re looking for a peaceful shopping getaway, think about adding this treasure to your city tour.
sources.shortName: The Top 10 Biggest Shopping Malls in Dubai

places.name: City Centre Mirdif

reviews.text: They always have promition especially bath and body. You cant be bored while shopping. Have for child to play. A nice cinema. Fast food resto and coffee shop. A lot of make up stores. My favorite was carrefour cheap price has food court inside vegetable are good.

A clean and modern Dubai-style mall with almost everything under one roof. Retail, furniture, supermarket, cafes and restaurants, and lot of entertainment options including a cinema and indoor skydiving experience. I don't like the parking and find the exit routes very confusing but I like its simple layout (a two-level square) with over 1km of walking space.

Mirdif City Centre - honestly, we're not quite sure why we fell in love with this mall… but we just did! There's something about it that makes you never want to leave. Whether it's the welcoming atmosphere, the spotless environment, or the consistently professional customer service, the experience here is always a pleasure.

Entertainment options are unlimited - especially for families. Kids will have a blast with so many activities to choose from, including (but not limited to) Bowling, Magic Planet, and plenty more to explore.

It's one of those places that just feels right every time you visit. We truly hope it continues to inspire and welcome everyone the way it always has.

places.address: Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Rd, Mirdif - Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: City Centre Al Zahia is a massive mall currently under development and set to open in March 2021. It will be the largest mall in the Northern Emirates, rivaling even the Dubai Mall in size. The location near University City promises convenience and accessibility. With plans for over 360 stores, including popular brands like Zara, as well as entertainment options such as Vox Cinema and Magic Planet, visitors can expect a diverse shopping and leisure experience.

sources.snippet: This mall which is currently in development, to be inaugurated in March 2021, is set to become the largest mall in the Northern Emirates upon its completion; boasting half the size of the biggest mall in the world which is the Dubai Mall. Bordering University City, this mall has a planned Vox Cinema, Carrefour, and a space for over 360 different stores. In addition to this, a Magic Planet and Little Explorers have also been announced, as well as an Alfresco dining area.

reviews.text: I absolutely love Al Zahia Mall! The shopping experience is epic-you'll find so many great stores, and the mall is huge. It even has a map, so you won't get lost. The restaurant options are amazing, with a wide variety of choices. Their Mumuso is massive-you can walk in and literally get lost in it! The play arcade is fantastic for both kids and adults, and the cinema experience is top-notch, with great snacks to enjoy. The parking space is huge, and if you forget where you parked, there's a device at the entrance/exit where you can enter your car number and find it easily. From makeup shops to coffee spots and all the fun activities, everything about this mall is just perfect!

City Centre Al Zahia is a beautifully designed and spacious mall that offers a wide variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment options. The atmosphere is vibrant yet comfortable, making it a great destination for families, friends, or even solo visits. The mall is clean, well-maintained, and features both high-end and affordable brands.

The food court has a diverse selection of cuisines, and the cinema experience is top-notch with modern facilities. Parking is generally easy to find, and the staff are polite and helpful.

The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is that it can get quite crowded on weekends, and a few areas could use more seating. Otherwise, it's an excellent place to spend a few hours shopping or relaxing.

We had recently visited Al Zahia City Center. The mall has a wide range of retail outlets which covers almost all your requirements

The Main Highlight is their different dining restaurant section which offers option from small snacks to complete main course meals which is separate from the Food Court which is usually the only option offered in malls.

The mall's design is sleek and contemporary, with ample space, making it easy to navigate even during busy hours.

There are also complimentary Wheelchairs which are available at the entrance of the mall so that visitors or older people who have trouble walking can use and explore which I feel is a very nice and thoughtful addition done from the mall sides

The Only reason I have given this mall a 4 Stars is because the Food Court is very crowded in peak times. There is absolutely no place to sit down and you might need to circle 3 to 4 times to find a  single chair to sit down. Not recommended to go in peak areas especially with a family

places.name: Sahara Centre

reviews.text: It is one of the biggest mall in the United Arab.  Situated between the border or Sharjah and Dubai, easily accessible from emirates.  Many international outlets for shopping and entertainment.  Novo multiplex is there for cinema.  Food court is so good. Easily accessible by bus.

Sahara Centre While it can be a bit hard to reach due to Sharjah traffic, it's still in a prime, central location that makes it worth the visit.

It is a well-designed mall with plenty of natural light, making the shopping and dinner experience very pleasant. It's not overly crowded, which is a big plus. You'll find all the essential amenities and a great selection of well-known brands. There are multiple activities available, so it's suitable for all ages specially families with kids.
Parking is easy to find, which adds to the convenience. Overall, a great mall to visit!

Sahara Centre Sharjah is a fantastic shopping and entertainment destination! With a vast array of stores, restaurants, and activities, there's something for everyone. The mall offers a diverse shopping experience, from high-end fashion brands to affordable options.

One of the standout features is the well-maintained facilities, including clean and spacious washrooms. The mall also has not one, but two conveniently located prayer rooms, providing a peaceful space for visitors to observe their prayers.

The food court is a highlight, offering a variety of cuisines to satisfy any craving. With plenty of seating options, it's a great spot to relax and refuel. The entertainment options are also plentiful, including a cinema and play areas.

The staff are friendly and helpful, and the mall's layout is easy to navigate. A good parking facility which if free. Overall, Sahara Centre Sharjah is a great destination for families, shoppers, and anyone looking for a comfortable and enjoyable experience. I highly recommend visiting this mall and taking advantage of its many amenities!"

places.generalDescription: Discover the vibrant and historic Blue Souk in Sharjah, also known as the central souk. This iconic market is adorned with a striking blue tile design and boasts over 600 shops offering a wide array of goods, including gold, electronics, clothing, perfume, and regional specialties. Divided into sections, the upper level features arts, crafts, clothing, and souvenirs while the water-facing side showcases traditional Bedouin jewelry and stones.

sources.snippet: With over 600 shops across two levels, you’ll find everything from modern watches and clothing to authentically local trinkets and souvenirs. For decor connoisseurs in particular, the souk is one of the must-do Sharjah tourist places. The upper level has shops featuring arts, crafts and regional specialties like handwoven textiles and intricate carpets and kilims.
sources.shortName: Shopping - Sharjah Events

sources.snippet: The blue souk is another amazing place for Eid shopping in Sharjah, and here you can do shopping your heart out but for a reasonable amount. You can find every type of goodies you want at a fair price. It is one of the  best places to shop for cheap in Sharjah for Eid.

places.name: Central Souk

reviews.text: This vast destination boasts an impressive array of well-stocked shops for every need. Notably, it hosts a convenient bus stop for the Sharjah bus tour, making it an excellent starting point for exploration. The real highlight is the stunning, panoramic view of the city skyline it offers. This spot is a photographer's dream, providing a perfect backdrop for capturing truly amazing and memorable photos. A must-visit for both its retail offerings and its breathtaking vistas.

Too much to walk, old building maintained well with a lot of shops, for cloths, shoes, bags, and ornaments all around. A nice view park is also available with corniche side of the sea makes the evening delightful..

For gold lovers this is THE place to go. Making charges are very low and reasonable. They have a wide selection of pieces from 18 kt modern designs to more traditional 21 kt Arab and 22 kt Indian designs. They also offer customization and repair services.

places.generalDescription: City Centre Deira is a modern and spacious shopping mall located between the Dubai Creek and the Dubai International Airport. It can be easily accessed via the metro, which stops right in front of it. With over 350 shops offering a variety of brands like Victoria's Secret, Zara, and G-Star Raw, as well as department stores such as Max Fashion, this mall provides ample shopping opportunities. Additionally, visitors can enjoy entertainment facilities including a 20-screen cinema with 3,000 seats.

sources.snippet: Deira City Centre is a retail hub that offers a variety of local and international brands. It is situated in the centre of Dubai. A great place to unwind and take in the city’s flora is the nearby City Centre Park.

reviews.text:

A special thank you to Mario, who was incredibly kind, attentive, and accommodating throughout our meal. He made us feel very welcome, and his service truly elevated our experience.

My boyfriend and I had a great time  we'll definitely be coming back again. Keep up the great work, Mario!

This is a pretty good mall in terms of  stores, architecture, and customer needs. It has all the basic amenities and more.Pretty fun Magic Planet here, and there's also Vox Cinemas!!!.The place is very long, and although it might look like a small place at first, it's not. It's really long, and there's quite a lot to walk. I would say this is a nice place to hang with friends or family once in a while. places.generalDescription: Rahmania Mall is a delightful community hub nestled in the Kshisha district, just a short 10-minute drive from Sharjah Airport. This charming mall aims to enhance the lives of its visitors by offering a convenient shopping experience that caters to everyday needs. With an array of retail stores, including a large Union Co supermarket and various dining options, it’s perfect for residents of Al Rahmaniya and Al Yasmeen.

sources.snippet: Rahmania mall aspires to make visitors’ life easier and better, a one-stop community shopping and leisure destination, it is strategically located at the heart of the Kshisha district and 10 minutes away from Sharjah Airport. The mall will take you through a convenient shopping experience, which will allow you to shop all what you need. Also, you will be able to enjoy different mall facilities, including retail stores, Cinema City, Faby Land, and many other entertainment options.
sources.shortName: Shopping - Sharjah Events

places.name: Rahmania Mall

reviews.text:
Wonderful experience at Sharjah Rahmania Mon!
I have visited here several times and every time it has truly satisfied me. The environment is very pleasant, calm, and clean. The staff are polite and sincere, which is truly admirable. The quality of the food (or products) is simply excellent - the taste, quality, and presentation all touch the heart.

It is a new modern small mall. Has all the essentials, including a supermarket, some bank branches, a cinema, and a food court. Also there are some brands and some other local shops. I didn't give the mall 5 stars just because of its size, so for those that prefer small sized malls, they may find it very convenient for shopping and spending time with friends and family.

The highlight was definitely the massive hypermarket, which has an incredible variety of products-you can literally find everything you're looking for. The selection is impressive and covers a wide range of needs, from groceries to home goods.

In addition, the mall has a cozy cinema and a small yet decent food court, which offers some good dining options. There's also a medical center, which is a nice touch for convenience. The mall houses plenty of other shops too, so there's always something to explore.

The interior of the mall is quite beautiful and well-maintained, creating a pleasant atmosphere to walk around. Parking is no issue here either, as there's a huge parking lot that easily accommodates the crowds.

For families, the kids' play area is a great addition, providing a fun zone for children to enjoy. Overall, this mall has a bit of everything-great shopping, entertainment, and family-friendly options. My only wish is that the food court had more variety, but all in all, it's a wonderful place to visit!

reviews.text: City Centre is my go-to destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment! The mall is spacious and well-organized, making it easy to navigate. The variety of stores is impressive, with everything from fashion and beauty to electronics and home goods. I love the food court options, with plenty of choices to suit different tastes and budgets. VOX Cinemas is a highlight, offering an immersive movie experience. The staff are friendly and helpful, and the atmosphere is lively and welcoming. Whether I'm shopping, dining, or catching a movie, City Centre always delivers.

Good place to spend time on. Various branded shops are available here. Carrefour wasn't so crowded as we usually predict. Huge parking facility. Normal range food court, we couldn't find so much options at food court.

A great place for shopping and leisure. From big international brands to everyday essentials, you can find almost everything under one roof. The cinema, food court, and arcade add to the overall experience, making it a good spot for families and friends to spend time together. Parking space is huge, but on weekends and public holidays, it gets really difficult to find a spot. Another plus is that there are plenty of banks and ATMs available, which is very convenient. Overall, a well-rounded mall with a little room for improvement in parking management.

Safeer Mall is a decent shopping destination with a variety of stores, dining options, and entertainment facilities. While it may not be as large or luxurious as some other malls in the UAE, it provides a comfortable shopping experience for families and individuals looking for convenience. The mall houses well-known retail brands, local shops, and a supermarket, making it a practical place for everyday shopping.

One of the best aspects of Safeer Mall is its affordability. Many stores offer budget-friendly prices, making it a good option for those looking for deals and discounts. The food court has a selection of fast food and casual dining restaurants, catering to different tastes. Parking is usually easy to find, and the mall is not overly crowded, allowing for a relaxed shopping experience.

However, the mall could improve in terms of entertainment and leisure activities. Compared to other shopping centers, there are limited options for kids and families looking for recreational activities. Additionally, the variety of high-end brands is limited, so those looking for luxury shopping may not find what they need.

Overall, Safeer Mall is a good choice for affordable shopping and dining, but it lacks some of the attractions of larger malls.

places.name: Oasis Mall

reviews.text:
Oasis Mall in Sharjah is a cozy, well-organized shopping spot located on Al Wahda Road. It's not as massive as some of the city's mega malls, but it packs in a solid variety of retail outlets like Centrepoint, Max, Home Centre, and Emax, along with a Carrefour for groceries. The mall is clean, easy to navigate, and perfect for those who prefer a more relaxed, crowd-free shopping experience.

Beyond shopping, Oasis Mall also caters well to families. There's a Fun Block play area for kids, a Cinépolis cinema for movie lovers, and a decent mix of dining options including McDonald's, KFC, and The Yellow Chilli. With ample parking, prayer rooms, and wheelchair accessibility, it offers both comfort and convenience. Overall, it's a great choice for a casual day out or a quick shopping trip with everything you need in one place. Even sometimes there is Max fashion sale.

Oasis Mall Sharjah is a wonderful place to visit, offering a peaceful and welcoming atmosphere. It's not overly crowded, making it perfect for a relaxed shopping experience. The mall is clean and well-organized, with a good variety of stores, dining options, and services to meet your needs. Whether you're shopping, dining, or just enjoying the calm ambiance, it's a great spot to spend your time.

Visited on Friday around 8:30 PM. Parking was easy to find, with plenty of free spaces available. The mall is centrally located on Al Wahda Road and is home to well-known brands like Centrepoint, Viva, Emax, Home Centre, Aladdin, and Max.

When we arrived, it wasn't crowded, which gave a spacious and fresh feeling. The food court on the third floor has a vibrant atmosphere with nice ambiance, though there are only a few outlets - McDonald's, Hong Kong, Sharif Bhai, and KFC. Right next to it, you'll find Cinepolis Cinema and a gaming zone. As the evening went on, the mall gradually became livelier.

The mall is clean, well-maintained, and compact, making it easy to navigate. It offers fashion, home, electronics, beauty, sports, and dining options, along with regular events and promotions. However, the variety of stores is a bit less than we expected.

Overall, it was a pleasant experience with a relaxed vibe, good food court, and plenty of free parking.

places.name: Ansar Mall

reviews.text:
Ansar Mall in Sharjah is a well-rounded shopping destination that brings together affordability, variety, and convenience. Spread across six levels, it offers everything from daily groceries and electronics to clothing, home décor, and furniture. The ground floor houses a full-scale supermarket with fresh produce, meat, bakery items, and more. As you move up, each floor is tailored to a specific category, making it easy to find exactly what you need without wandering aimlessly. It's especially popular among families and bargain hunters who appreciate a wide selection without the steep prices of larger malls.

The top floor is where the experience becomes more than just shopping. With the Ansar Taste food court serving a variety of cuisines and Ansar Land offering games and entertainment for kids, it's a great place to relax after a shopping spree. There's also Ansar Price, a section known for deep discounts on select items. While some shoppers note occasional lapses in customer service, the overall vibe remains positive thanks to the mall's practical layout, accessible location, and impressive product range. Whether you're running errands or enjoying a family outing, Ansar Mall delivers a convenient and enjoyable experience.

Ansar malls kids arena is one of the best value of money go-to place for kids. One pass to the specified play area inside the arena costs just 25 Aed for one hour. The good thing is that parent/guardian can also accompany the kid inside the area. Bonus part is that the rides inside the play area are absolutely free, so your kid can either enjoy the rides or play. The kids area Filipino staff is very polite and helpful.

Ansar Mall is an absolute delight for shoppers of all kinds. It offers a fantastic mix of shopping, from everyday essentials to trendy fashion and electronics, all under one roof. The layout is spacious and well-organised across 6 floors, making navigation effortless.

One of the standout features is the variety of affordable shopping options, which makes it perfect for families and budget-conscious visitors. The food court is excellent, offering a decent selection to satisfy every taste, and the ambience is generally clean and welcoming.

Staff across the mall are courteous and helpful, ensuring a smooth shopping experience. Parking is convenient and easy to access, via the outdoor, sandy, free car park next door, and the overall atmosphere feels lively yet comfortable.

There are also prayer rooms, toilets and wudu facilities on floor 6.

Ansar Mall is ideal for anyone looking for a well-rounded shopping experience in Sharjah - whether for groceries, clothing, or a casual day out with family. Highly recommended!
reviews.author_name: Dr Tariq Ahmad PhD CEng MIET

places.generalDescription: Safeer Mall Sharjah, located near the Al Nahda area in Dubai, is a vibrant shopping destination that opened its doors in 2006. Spanning over 1.2 million square feet across four levels, the mall boasts an impressive array of 140 stores and a retail space of 500,000 square feet. Visitors can explore a diverse range of shops including popular brands like Adidas, Nike, and Dunlop alongside dining options such as Cafe Supreme and ChicKing.

places.generalDescription: Al Shaab Village, located near the rental villas in Al Hazannah, is a popular shopping destination in Sharjah. It boasts an exhibition-style complex with over 250 stores offering a wide range of products, from traditional clothing to household goods. The mall also features an ice-skating rink, amusement park, food courts, billiard hall, and cinema. Visitors can enjoy affordable shopping and entertainment at this centrally located mall.

sources.snippet: Located near the rental villas in Al Hazannah, Al Shaab Village is one of the largest shopping malls in the emirate of Sharjah with an exhibition-style complex consisting of over 250 stores. Due to the large variety of shopping outlets, the mall is commonly referred to as Sharjah’s Global Village. While this mall doesn’t offer conventional shopping with branded outlets, it offers a wide range of products ranging from traditional men’s and women’s clothing to household goods.

reviews.text: Shopping experience was so good with good offers and all. All items are available in the grand mall electronics, groceries, perfumes , clothes, etc. mostly you can see malayalis there. Cafeteria also available for food and all. Jewellery are available for purchase money exchange also available.

Grand Mall Sharjah is a great spot for grocery shopping, with plenty of offers and discounts that are hard to ignore. The variety of products available makes it a convenient place for all your household needs. The frequent promotions add excellent value, making it a budget-friendly option for shoppers.

However, one area that needs improvement is the availability of staff for assistance. It can be difficult to find a shelf attendant when you need help locating a product, often requiring you to walk to a different section just to ask for assistance. If the management could ensure more staff are present and easily accessible on the floor, it would make the shopping experience much smoother.

Overall, it's a good place for groceries with great deals, but a bit more attention to customer support would elevate the experience.

Great Shopping Experience at Grand Mall, Sharjah! 🛍️

I recently visited Grand Mall in Sharjah, and I was really impressed by what it had to offer. The mall is always bustling with people, which shows how popular it is – and for good reason!
🔸 Supermarket: I started with the supermarket, where I found everything I needed at decent prices and good quality. They have many ongoing offers, and right now there's a special Onam Sale happening.
🔸 Fresh Fish Section: The fish variety was amazing – fresh and well-packed, even for those travelling long distances. There's also a grilling area, so you can have your fish grilled right there!
🔸 Grand Card: You can also get the Grand Card for additional offers and deals.
🔸 Shops and Services: On the Ground Floor, you'll find:
Perfume shops
Dates shops
Etisalat counter
ADCB ATM
Popcorn Corner
LIFE Pharmacy
Lulu Exchange
Kanz Opticals
...and much more!

🔸 First Floor: The upper level has electronics, clothing, and other goods, all at affordable prices that suit everyone's budget.
The mall is located approximately 1 km from Rolla Park / Rolla Bus Station, making it easily accessible. You can also share your phone number to get updates on exclusive offers and promotions.
👉 If you're in Sharjah and looking for a good shopping destination, Grand Mall is definitely worth a visit!

places.generalDescription: Matajer Al Quoz is part of a network of neighborhood retail centers in Sharjah, offering high-quality retail and essential services. Anchored by Carrefour, it provides a premium shopping experience with fashion stores, dining options, cafes, and more. The center also features banking services, electronics outlets, beauty stores, and pharmacies for convenience.

sources.snippet: Matajer is a neighbourhood retail centre concept by Sharjah Holding, a joint venture between Majid Al Futtaim Properties and the government of Sharjah, bringing small-scale, high quality retail and easy access to everyday services to neighbourhoods across Sharjah. The flagship Matajer Al Quoz opened in October 2011, followed by Matajer Al Juraina, Matajer Al Khan and Matajer Al Mirgab in 2012 in residential and academic areas of Sharjah. All Matajer locations are anchored by Majid Al Futtaim – Retail’s Carrefour, to complete the premium community shopping experience, which includes quick availability of banking, electronics, beauty and pharmacy needs.

reviews.text:
Gooooood place for shoppng
They have carrefour and other shops…..

We went for my sister's final driving license test, and we were quite hungry. We noticed a mall located near the SDI. Although not all the shops were open, they had a coffee shop, McDonald's, Caribou Coffee, Domino's, an exchange center, Aster, ATM, optical stores, beauty center and a couple of kiosks. It's not a very large mall, but it had all the necessary items. The mall was quiet, calm, and clean, and the washrooms were decent. There was ample parking available.

**Matajer Al Quoz** is a retail and commercial development located in Al Quoz, Dubai. It typically features:

- **Retail Outlets**: Various shops and stores offering a range of products, including fashion, electronics, and home goods.
- **Dining Options**: Restaurants and cafes providing diverse food and beverage choices.
- **Service Facilities**: Banks, pharmacies, and other essential services.
- **Entertainment and Leisure**: Options for recreation, such as cinemas or family entertainment areas.

Matajer Al Quoz is designed to be a convenient shopping and lifestyle destination for residents and visitors in the Al Quoz area. For specific details about the outlets and services available, it's best to visit the location or check their official website. If you need further information, feel free to ask!
